DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE : RETAIL
DOC.TEXT: Dual Concept Test : Carl ' s Jr . franchisees Gary and Anne Wiles opened a dual concept restaurant in late October that features the chain ' s burgers as well as Mexican-style fast food from the Green Burrito chain.The restaurant on Pacific Coast Highway in Dana Point is part of an ongoing test marketing program to determine if additional Carl ' s Jr.-Green Burrito restaurants will be opened . Anne Wiles is a daughter of Carl N . Karcher , founder of the Carl ' s Jr . fast-food chain .
